sections.text: Copy of petition for authority to be served on heirs and legatees; exceptionA certified copy of the succession representative's petition for authority to exchange succession property shall be served, as provided in Article 1314, on all heirs and legatees of the deceased who have not joined in this petition. The petition need not be served on a legatee who has received all of his legacies as provided in the testament.Added by Acts 1962, No. 92, ยง3; Amended by Acts 1988, No. 578, ยง1.
